name: Slider Scouts
description:
Swipe, slide, and explore as you build your troop of Slider Scouts!

Your lone Slider Scout is late for camp, and needs help recruiting more scouts for his troop at the Scout Lodge. Swipe to send this miniature burger on a massive adventure through the uncharted forest, where there are new surprises around every corner! Scouts will keep sliding until they bump into a wall blocking their way, so you'll need to guide him on a route through the wilderness. Keep swiping to send him in different directions, and try to reach the exit so your slider can continue his travels and scout out the next area.

EXPLORING
New puzzling paths await you at every turn! Traps, blocks, and baddies are scattered across the land, and you'll have to keep sliding to find the best path through all of the obstacles. Watch out for spike traps, cannons, and condiment baddies that try to slide in your way. Use collapsing bridges, ramps and switches to find your way through the puzzling passages. Slide into baddies to squish them and earn points, and be sure to collect any Point Stars and shiny Coins that you find.

RANKS AND REWARDS
Don't worry if you get hurt while exploring! You'll be sent back to the Scout Lodge, where the points you've collected go towards earning a new Rank for your scout troop. When you level up, you can earn extra coins, prizes, discover new locations, and even recruit new slider scouts for your troop! Then it's time to slide right back into your travels, and keep working your way through the ever-changing landscape.

COLLECT NEW SCOUTS
Use your collected coins to awaken the Great Slider Shrine, where you have a chance to summon and collect new scouts to add to your troop! All of your scouts will stay in the Scout Lodge, and you can switch between any of your playable scouts before heading out on the trail. Unlock scouts based on characters from your favorite Papa Louie games like Papa's Freezeria and Papa's Cheeseria, as well as scouts from Cactus McCoy, Jacksmith, and other Flipline games!

DECORATE YOUR LODGE
Decorate your Scout Lodge with hundreds of furniture items you find while exploring. The Scout Lodge has many separate rooms for all of your scouts, so you can decorate each room with different themes, and change the walls and flooring to match your decor.

EARN MERIT BADGES
Build up your scout troop's reputation by completing quests to earn Merit Badges! When you start a round of exploring, you'll get a specific quest to complete as you make your way through your travels. Once you complete the quest, you'll receive a gift of coins and a special Merit Badge to display in your Scout Lodge. After a while you'll have a chance to start a new quest, so keep up your hard work to fill your display case with Merit Badges!


GAME FEATURES

- Simple pick-up-and-play controls
- 80 Unique Scouts to Unlock
- Earn hundreds of furniture items
- Decorate all the rooms in the Scout Lodge
- Over a dozen different locations to explore
- New puzzling paths await you at every turn
- Earn coins to awaken the Great Slider Shrine
- Complete daily quests to earn badges & coins
